Former ITV Granada Head of Development Siobhan Greene - nicknamed` Shoe'- then took the award from Simon Cowell and told the audience: It's brilliant to be alive. She is married to Stockport-raised Nigel Hall, who was controller of entertainment at Granada until 2003 when the company was merged with Carlton. Simon Cowell `` I wanted to do a show where judges could help competitors on a weekly basis,'' Simon Cowell said, comparing the job to his days as an A&R rep at a record label. It's more interesting to me; it definitely gives me something more to do. When an artist wins, you win. It really does become an incredible competition with judges, in a way more than the artists, because we don't pretend to like each other. Simon Cowell said a decision about who will sit beside him on the panel will be made in the next three or four weeks. He says he's looking for people who could one-up him in battle.

MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained`` more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers.'' The article asks, Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page? While there's no reason to think Google would kill off Google Apps, there are scenarios that could trouble enterprise customers, Gartner analysts say. Colin Powell said he was concerned about what he characterized as a recent negative turn of Republican candidate John McCain 's campaign, such as the campaign's attempts to tie Barack Obama to former 1960s radical Bill Ayers . I think that's inappropriate. I understand what politics is about-- I know how you can go after one another, and that's good. But I think this goes too far, and I think it has made the John McCain campaign look a little narrow. It's not what the American people are looking for, he said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. .`` Egyptian cultural heritage, both its monuments and its artefacts, are part of the ancestral heritage of humanity, handed down to us through the ages,'' she said on Tuesday. The value of the 120,000 pieces in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo is inestimable, not only in scientific or financial terms, but because they represent the Egyptian people?s cultural identity. But the country's newly appointed minister of antiquities, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against`` rumours.'' Mr Eric Schmidt said that the company's three top executives had decided to`` clarify'' their roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. The company had always argued in the past that its unusual leadership arrangements worked well, and that it reflected the fact that Google was operated differently from most traditional companies.
